page.title: 19ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
This section of the 1985 Domesday Survey was compiled by the third and fourth year Junior children of Siddington School, near Cirencester Here are the names of those taking part :- Paula Baxter,Helen Carruthers,Claire Collingwood,Emma Curtis,Heidi Gardiner Casey Goble,Neil Godwin,Darren Hibbert Anna Hunt,Philippa Mead,David Miles, Mahalah Norman,Timothy Saxton,Rebecca Stephens,Robin Williams,Mark Winter. Daniella Bernasconi,Rachel Boulton, Melissa Brazier,Debbie Chambers,Rachel Hampson,Samantha Holmes,Philip Kilby, Peter Monk,Mark Pattinson,Sarah Smith.
The co-ordinator was the Headmaster, Mr.Michael Appleby; and valuable help was given by the chairman of the school governors, Rev.Peter Sudbury. (Continued on page 20)
